summary: This is a list of things named for former President of the United States Ronald Reagan.
full_text:
Harrisburg is a community that is now  located within the city of Houston, Texas, United States.
The community is located east of Downtown Houston, south of the Brays Bayou and Buffalo Bayou junction, and west of Brady's Island. It was founded before 1825 on the eastern stretches of the Buffalo Bayou in present-day Harris County, Texas, on land belonging to John Richardson Harris. In 1926, Harrisburg was annexed into the city of Houston. The original name of Harris County was Harrisburg  County until it was shortened after the demise of the City of Harrisburg.
title: Harrisburg, Houston
